attributes.action: Consider the issue of outsourcing companies working for HM Govt using staff in different countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government of Great Britain should encourage employers in this country, employ British residents. However, Capita who are employed by a number of departments of HMG to conduct various activities, have sent some of their work for the Criminal Records Bureau to their operations in Mumbai.
The Government should look into this issue, as it is one thing for private companies to engage in this practise, but to do it on behalf of the British taxpayer is morally indefencible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
